properties.entry: SELECT INQUIRE_NO , AS_CATEGORY , memId , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_CREAT FROM ANSWER A JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = MEM_ID) ORDER BY INQUIRE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO ANSWER ( INQUIRE_NO , AS_CATEGORY , MEM_ID , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( 'AS-'||LPAD(SEQ_AS.NEXTVAL,3,0) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ) JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = MEM_ID)
INSERT INTO ANSWER ( AN_CONTENT MN_NO ) VALUES ( ? ,? )
